title: Wererat

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During a Full Moon, poison another player
- During a New Moon, steal another player's rations

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your poison cannot be cured
- You have Detection Immunity, but only during non-Full Moon Nights.
- You have a night chat with other Weres
- For information on rations, please see Ravenous Rat (Post 1434)

fields.name: Hunting Moon Enchancement:
fields.value:
Infestation
Your Target's Visitors will be poisoned.
